name: StockOS
description:
StockOS makes it easier to use an operating system, it is fun, and has a lot of features! Use StockOS today! Oh, and you can edit it using the source code given! The pass is stockos. 

Also, if you already don't have it, install .NET Framework 4.8.

https://dotnet.microsoft.com/en-us/download/dotnet-framework/net48

To edit the game, install Visual Studio:

https://visualstudio.microsoft.com
